answers.answer: Ugh  i just did ths yesterday for my first time im def scared because my sugar levels never been high with my last 2 pregnancies. Have u been thru this b4??
I had to do.mine 2 times. It was so annoying!

I did once and I literally turned green almost threw up all over the place and almost fell over in the hospital where I was getting it done.I told my doctor that if they wanted me to do the 3 hour test ever again that they were just going to have to send me to a dietitian and give me the diabetic testing supplies cuz I'd rather pricked my finger 20 times a day then to sit through that test again! she got the hint and I luckily past my 1 hour with my two subsequent pregnancies.
I had to take it. And I did end up passing. The drink tastes the same as the one hour. Its not that bad just ***** waiting around for hours and having to get pricked three times
I had to do the 3 hour test. It was rough.  Got my blood drawn 4 times and felt nauseous.  I passed though.  Not fun..
I took the 1hr glucose and the results came out high so I was scheduled to take the 3hr test. My results came back normal. I'll be taking the 1hr test tomorrow for gestational diabetes...

I never had high sugar, I call this one my trouble baby. I think the fact that I need to drink thisn mess on a empty stomach is going to be my biggest issue. I already can't function if I don't eat. Gross, I am going to try and take it and keep it down. Nasty mess!

question: Had anyone else had to do this? This will be my third time and I am not a happy camper.
title: 3 hour sugar test!!
